name: Magic Blast: Mystery Puzzle
description:
Welcome to Magic Blast: Mystery Puzzle - an addictive same-match block game that will keep you entertained for hours!

Join Charlotte the mystical witch, in this exciting adventure full of dragons and magic!
Match colorful blocks to collect various dragons and complete your missions!
If you need extra help, just use special items!
Are you ready to enter the world of magic?

HOW TO PLAY:
• Tap on 2+ adjacent blocks of the same color.
• Match the blocks in fewer moves to get higher points.
• Reach your goal by matching every block carefully.

FEATURES:
• Over 300+ exciting levels to play!
• Earn awesome daily rewards!
• Complete levels to unlock the Dragon’s Nest!
• Use magical boosters & special items for extra help!
• No wifi required. Match blocks offline!

NOTES:
• Magic Blast: Mystery Puzzle contains video ads.
• Magic Blast: Mystery Puzzle is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like hearts and coins.
• Explore Magic Blast: Mystery Puzzle on mobile or tablet!

E-MAIL:
• contactus@puzzle1studio.com

PRIVACY POLICY
• https://www.puzzle1studio.com/privacy-policy/

Start your magical adventure now and start blasting for endless fun!
